process(Character) - Method in class modele.Border

process(Character) - Method in class modele.Cheater
Process the interaction between the cheater and a character If the character is a hunter, it will give him the worst direction to the treasure Otherwise, it will give him a random direction

process(Character) - Method in class modele.occupant_no_moveable.RoadMap

process(Character) - Method in class modele.occupant_no_moveable.Stone
Process the interaction between a character and the stone It breaks the stone for a short period of time if the character has a pickaxe (only hunters can have a pickaxe) Otherwise, it will make the character go to the closest side of the wall using the tempDir attribute of the character
